rsbNotes.title: Pr 3:27–35
rsbNotes.text: 3:27–35 The section begins with a series of commandments about certain abuses in human relationships (vv. 27–31). These are followed by clauses explaining the Lord’s direct interest in the morality of these precepts (vv. 32–35).

rsbNotes.title: Pr 3:32
rsbNotes.text: 3:32 Devious persons are alienated from God, but those who are righteous enjoy intimacy with the Lord.
